content:
Created vulnerable FastAPI app in `./testing/vulnerable_app.py` with:

- SQL Injection in `/login` (f-string query)
- Reflected XSS in `/search` (unescaped `{q}` in HTML)

DB setup complete (`./testing/users.db` with admin/secret user).

Server hosted in background on http://localhost:5000 (log: `./testing/server.log`). 

Quick verify/exploit tests:

To setup (if needed): `curl http://localhost:5000/setup`

Normal login: `curl -X POST http://localhost:5000/login -d "username=admin&password=secret"`

SQLi exploit: `curl -X POST http://localhost:5000/login -d "username=admin'%20OR%20'%271'%3D%271&password=foo"` (bypasses auth)

XSS: `curl "http://localhost:5000/search?q=<script>alert(1)</script>"` (injects script in <b>)

Ready for SkyHammer patching test! Run your SkyHammer agent on `./testing/vulnerable_app.py` - it will read, test, report, and patch the original file. 

Summary: Files created/hosted successfully in `./testing`.
